title: Medieval Village Music (Themes and Variations)
longDescription:
Embark on an epic journey through medieval realms with my latest Game Music Pack: Medieval Village Music. Immerse yourself in the spirit of knights, castles, and lively festivities with this captivating collection. Elevate your game's atmosphere with an unforgettable medieval soundscape that adds joy and excitement to every quest!


Previews: https://youtu.be/6EFDrtMzeG0?si=iUF99mvmWf6m_FBC


https://soundcloud.com/iustin-galea/medieval-village-music?si=56e3b25c728849ce9f1466b7205aab8d&utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing


Discover 6 main themes, each beautifully crafted with unique variations. These loopable instrumental tracks are available in high-quality (16-bit, 44.1kHz WAV files), offering over 23 minutes and a total of 23 authentic medieval soundtracks.


Ideal for enhancing the immersive experience of your game, whether it's set in bustling villages, majestic castles, or adventurous quests. Bring your medieval fantasy world to life with music that resonates with every player.

For a truly unique gaming experience, tailor-made just for you, inquire about custom music and sound effects Contact me at iustingaleaoficial@gmail.com to bring your vision to life through enchanting audio.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 6 main themes original loopable tracks
  • 17 variations of original loopable tracks
  • 23 + minutes of music
  • 23 YouTube Safe Tracks

Number of Audio Wavs: 23

Number of Audio Cues: 23

Sample rate/bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16-bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 23 + minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
